alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:23PM PST until December 24 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow with areas of blowing snow. Snow accumulations of 6 inches to 2 feet above 6000 feet. 2-4 inches below 6000 feet. * WHERE...Elevations above 6000 feet. * WHEN...Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow amounts increase drastically with height. This means roads at higher elevations will get worse much faster than lower elevation roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
